input: If set to true,then Nautilus will use the user's home folder as the desktop.If it is false,then it will use Desktop as the desktop.
target: Ọ bụrụ na a haziri ya na eziokwu,Nautilus ga-eji nsomebefaịlụ ụlọ nke ojieme dịka desktọ́ọ̀pụ̀.Ọ bụrụ na ọ bụ àsị́,mgbe ahụ ọ ga-eji Desktọ́ọ̀pụ̀ dịka desktọ́ọ̀pụ̀.

input: GNOME's greatest strength is our strong community.Virtually anyone,with or without coding skills,can contribute to making GNOME better.
target: Ike GNOME bụ nkwekọrịta ndị mmadụ gbasara ya.Ọbụnagodi onye ọbụla,má mọọbụ amaghị usoromumeihe ọrụ ǹkà ya,ga-enwenwu ike inyeaka n'ọdị mma GNOME.

input: This key specifies the number of seconds each frame will be displayed.
target: Kii a na-ezipụta ọnụọgụgụ nke oge nke otu ntabianya a ga-egosipụta freemu nke ọbụla.
